headline: Bernstein's China semicap outlook: Revised up logic but revised down DRAM
summary: Investing.com -- Bernstein adjusted its China WFE (wafer fabrication equipment) industry model in a note this week, raising its outlook for logic/foundry WFE while lowering projections for DRAM WFE, largely due to export control restrictions introduced by the U.S. in early 2025.
